description: Returns all export snapshot records created as a result of the export snapshot operation. An export snapshot record can be used to create a new Amazon EC2 instance and its related resources with the CreateCloudFormationStack action.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetExportSnapshotRecords request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: exportSnapshotRecords
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the export snapshot records.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The export snapshot record name.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the export snapshot record.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the export snapshot record was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type ( ExportSnapshotRecord).

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the export snapshot record.

nested_items.name: sourceInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the source of the export snapshot record.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type ( InstanceSnapshot or DiskSnapshot).

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the source instance or disk snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the source instance or disk snapshot.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source instance or disk snapshot.

nested_items.name: fromResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the snapshot's source instance or disk.

nested_items.name: fromResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot's source instance or disk.

nested_items.name: instanceSnapshotInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing an instance snapshot.

nested_items.name: fromBundleId
nested_items.description: The bundle ID from which the source instance was created ( micro_x_x).

nested_items.name: fromBlueprintId
nested_items.description: The blueprint ID from which the source instance ( amazon_linux_2023).

nested_items.name: fromDiskInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the disks that were attached to the source instance.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The disk name.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The disk path.

nested_items.name: sizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in GB ( 32).

nested_items.name: isSystemDisk
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this disk is a system disk (has an operating system loaded on it).

nested_items.name: diskSnapshotInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing a disk snapshot.

nested_items.name: sizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in GB ( 32).

nested_items.name: destinationInfo
nested_items.description: A list of objects describing the destination of the export snapshot record.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource created at the destination.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: The destination service of the record.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
